parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering System Failure (Steering Box, Power Steering, Hydroboost System)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Excessive play in the steering wheel (2-4 inches)
loud pop or metal failure sound
steering wheel turns to the right when brakes are applied
power steering assist appears to turn off and on
steering wheel feels loose or dead
vehicle wanders or shakes uncontrollably
difficulty controlling the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can lead to serious injury or fatalities. Additionally, the deceptive advertising of safety features can lead to a false sense of security, potentially causing harm to drivers and passengers.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in the event of a crash
airbag warning light is illuminated
abnormal sizzling sound
smoke detected.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Bosch CP4 fuel pump can cause the engine to shut down suddenly, leading to a loss of power steering and power brakes, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially when towing heavy loads.
symptoms: The engine suddenly quits running
the vehicle will not restart
metal shavings are found in the fuel system
damage to the fuel injectors and other components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The death wobble and transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, and potentially resulting in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a severe shaking or wobbling
the transmission failure warning light illuminates
a message appears stating that the vehicle will shut off in a certain distance
the vehicle loses power or shuts off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Unresolved Vehicle Shaking and Stability Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unresolved vehicle shaking and stability issues can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents, and potentially resulting in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The vehicle shakes or wobbles while driving
the stability track warning indicator light is illuminated and flashing
the vehicle is unable to be diagnosed or repaired despite multiple attempts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake booster cylinder can cause a soft or spongy brake pedal, making it difficult to stop the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal has to be pushed almost all the way to the floor to stop
the brake pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.
